name: @debrief/shared-types
description: Shared types for Debrief ecosystem with constrained GeoJSON FeatureCollections

scripts.build:ts: npm run build:ts:featurecollection && npm run build:ts:track && npm run build:ts:point && npm run build:ts:annotation
scripts.build:ts:featurecollection: npx json-schema-to-typescript schema/featurecollection.schema.json --cwd schema/ > derived/typescript/featurecollection.ts && echo '\n// Union type for all Debrief feature types\nexport type DebriefFeature = DebriefTrackFeature | DebriefPointFeature | DebriefAnnotationFeature;' >> derived/typescript/featurecollection.ts
scripts.build:ts:re-export: echo "// Re-export from featurecollection to avoid duplication\nexport { Debrief${INTERFACE_NAME}Feature } from \"./featurecollection\";" > derived/typescript/${FILE_NAME}.ts
scripts.build:python: npm run build:python:track && npm run build:python:point && npm run build:python:annotation && npm run build:python:featurecollection
scripts.build:types: npm run build:ts && npm run build:python
scripts.build:dist: npm run build:types && mkdir -p dist && npx tsc
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:dist
scripts.test:generated: npm run test:generated:ts && npm run test:generated:python
scripts.test:validators: npm run test:validators:ts && npm run test:validators:python
scripts.test: npm run test:generated && npm run test:validators && npm run test:schemas
scripts.validate: npm run build && npm run test

author: Debrief Team
